Class Algorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shortestpathsolver.algorithms.Algorithm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AStar, BFS, Dijkstra

    public abstract class Algorithm
extends Object
    Abstract algorithm class. Contains implemented and unimplemented methods used in algorithm classes.
